title: Sausage, pumpkin and sage casserole
description: This comforting sausage casserole is the perfect Bonfire night recipe to warm you up on a sparkling night.
ingredients: 6 good-quality sausages, pricked several times with a fork
1 small pumpkin, peeled, seeds removed, cut into equal-sized pieces
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 tbsp chopped fresh flatleaf parsley, to serve
